content.question: Based on this information, which of the following conclusions can be drawn about the polarity of the stationary phase and mobile phase used in this experiment?

choices.label: Stationary Phase Mobile Phase Nonpolar Polar
Stationary Phase Mobile Phase Nonpolar Nonpolar
Stationary Phase Mobile Phase Polar Polar
Stationary Phase Mobile Phase Polar Nonpolar

content.answer: Stationary Phase Mobile Phase Polar Nonpolar

skill.text: 6.F: Explain the connection between experimental results and chemical concepts, processes, or theories.
